Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25735802] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus 29213(MIC=64 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis 12228(MIC=16 μM), Enterococcus faecalis 29212(MIC=16 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli 25922(MIC=8 μM), Escherichia coli 1005(MIC=16 μM), Salmonella typhimurium 7731(MIC=16 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25735802] MHC5>256 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.25735802] The peptide exhibited no cytoxicity against HaCaT cells in the range of 0/25-256 μM.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Characterization of antimicrobial activity and mechanisms of low amphipathic peptides with different α-helical propensity
Literature.Author: Xin Zhu, Licong Zhang, Jue Wang, Zhi Ma, Wei Xu, Jianping Li, Anshan Shan
